body.name: Garmin DriveSmart 66 EX GPS Navigation Device, 6-inch Car GPS Navigator - 010-02469-13 (Refurbished)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 5 hrs 16 mins
features: Enjoy easy-to-see maps on a bright, crisp 6” high-resolution display.
Talk to me. Enjoy convenient Garmin voice assist for directions and hands-free calling.
Get a heads-up with driver alerts for sharp curves, speed changes, school zones and more.
Discover where history happened with the included HISTORY database of notable sites.
Know the best places along your route with Tripadvisor traveler ratings and a U.S. national parks directory.
Make all the right moves with clear, detailed map updates of North America.
body.description: Simplify your drive with the Garmin DriveSmart series of GPS navigators. Use Garmin voice assist to easily find and navigate where you want to go. The crisp 6" display and map updates of North America show you the way, providing alerts for speed changes and potential hazards ahead. Make the most of road trips with Tripadvisor® traveler ratings, a directory of U.S. national parks and the HISTORY® database of notable sites. Pair with the Garmin Drive™ app on your compatible smartphone for on-screen access to live traffic, fuel prices, parking, weather and traffic cams to help avoid delays and keep you on your way.Features:6” high-resolution navigator includes map updates of North AmericaHands-free calling when paired with your compatible smartphone with BLUETOOTH technology and convenient Garmin voice assist lets you ask for directions to places you want to goRoad trip–ready features include the HISTORY database of notable sites, a U.S. national parks directory, Tripadvisor traveler ratings and millions of Foursquare POIsDriver alerts for things such as school zones, sharp curves and speed changes help encourage safer driving and increase situational awarenessAccess live traffic, fuel prices, parking, weather and smart notifications when you pair this navigator with your compatible smartphone running the Garmin Drive appWith Alexa Built-in (Drivers should focus on driving and only use this function when safe to do so. Must pair with the Garmin Drive app running on your compatible phone), you can ask to play music, listen to audiobooks, hear the news and more — all while you keep your hands on the wheel and eyes on the roadBuilt-in Wi-Fi connectivity allows easy map and software updates without a computerIncluded dual USB charger provides an extra charging port for phones, tablets or other electronics, Discover where history happened with the included HISTORY database of notable sites.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like getting used to a new spouse
reviews.reviewText: GREAT GPS, and I've had quite a few. The voice instructions are fun to use. I had a guest in the car with me and he asked it to find a close-by McDonalds and it gave us a few. When it lists 6, I have not found the right words to tell it to give me #whatever.... Soon perhaps. Or...sometimes I have to actually touch the thing....like ALL my old ones. A+ for this one, though!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertized
reviews.reviewText: I upgraded from a Garmin I bought 12 years ago. The addition of Bluetooth and WiFi has really improved the user interface and experience. Setup was a breeze. I purchased a reconditioned model and was happy with the product. Since I always leave it attached to my car I don't care if the battery has some degradation.My favorite upgrade is the ability to see incoming phone calls. I must admit the quality of the phone call is iffy, but then even the sound quality of cellphones pretty much sucks.Overall recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Garmin is the best.
reviews.reviewText: Apple Maps comes in second to Garmin. It’s nice to have a dedicated GPS and it’s typically updated faster and more often than a built in vehicle GPS. We prefer this over the built in navigation on our 14 Mercedes E350.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Garmin I’ve had yet
reviews.reviewText: I have had several gps systems from factory to tom toms and 2 other Garmin and this one is by far the best gps I’ve ever had

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poorly thought out gps , Garmin has become Garbage
reviews.reviewText: This thing takes several hours to update and has errors during the update download that makes you restart the whole process.I tried to get the maps updated for over 2 weeks, it never fully made it.I threw it in the glove box since it deletes the stored files during the update process, I can't even use it to navigate now with the old maps that were in it and can't send it back.Don't waste your money on this junk

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Refurbished and with navigation issues
reviews.reviewText: First of all it was my fault for trusting and buying a refurbished electronic device. I returned this item the same day that I received it. I tested this GPS the same day that I received it from Amazon.Pros:>I like the size of the screen and I like how light weight it is.Cons:>After doing a test run on the streets around the city, I returned it because as you drive the arrow on the screen was not on the street but on the side of the streets as I traveled.>The navigation does not warn you of the next turn until you are less than .03 miles from the turn which is a problem if you are in heavy traffic.>Once I setup the GPS bluetooth feature with my car radio and phone, I realized that this was not a good idea. Once I received a phone call it came in over my car radio like normal and the GPS which was not good. Too many distractions with the GPS showing me the same thing as my phone and radio in the dash. Some people may like that feature so maybe not a negative.Overall if it did not have an issue with the arrow, locating my house and less than .03 notification to turn, I would have not returned it. Again my fault for trusting and buying a refurbished electronic device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has most of the features you need.
reviews.reviewText: I picked this product because it allows the user to see when the next gas station, or fast food is coming up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is a replacement unit
